title: ZK I Zettel 6,3,5e - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body:

the principle of identity would be violated andthe idea of the unity of the system destroyed. To reducethe idea of justice to the idea of equalityor unity of order means no more and no lessthan the replacement of the ethical by the logicalideal.
